name: Acrid Quest
description:
A True Survival Horror Experience in 64x64 Horrifying Pixels!

Acrid Quest is a top-down survival horror game inspired by a merging of the Legend of Zelda and Resident Evil.

  • Collect keys and items to help you on your quest
  • No HUD - for a horror-purist experience
  • Slay or run from vicious enemies
  • Explore a dark and disorienting forest
  • Learn the secret of the Acrid Quest

Acrid Quest was created for the LOW REZ JAM 2020. 

Developer Tips!

  • Your character will tell you how he is holding up, just listen for how he is breathing!
  • Water is the source of all life - drink it to regain your health
  • If you're outnumbered, sometimes it's better to run!
  • it's tough to hold your torch and move at the same time - putting it away will help you move faster

Title music from sawsquarenoise

other sound effects from FreeMusicArchive.org and BXFR

breathing and other noises by Klankbeeld
